account.name: Name
account.nameHint: Name of the account, length 1 - 256 characters, use '.' for hierarchical categorization when summarizing
account.noteHint: Note for the account, length 0 - 512 characters

level.lessHint: Support a little, show ads only on the home screen and editors.
level.noneHint: If it isn't clickable, it's definitely a bug!

ads.talk: After being developed, it's inevitable that there may be errors. As time progresses and other services update, if I don't keep up with the modifications and updates, it can lead to malfunctions. All of these require continuous maintenance funding, and I rely on advertising revenue for this. If I have been helpful to you, please consider opening the advertisements, viewing them, helping to support me, and providing more strength to maintain and add new features.

book.currencyHint: Currency of the book, e.g., USD, JPY, TWD for identification, 0 - 5 characters
book.fractionDigitsHint: The number of decimal places used when presenting amounts in the book.
book.name: Name
book.nameHint: Name of the book, length 1 - 128 characters
book.noteHint: Note for the book, length 0 - 512 characters
book.symbolHint: The currency symbol used for representing amounts in the book, e.g., $, €, ¥. It should be between 0 and 5 characters long. If not set, it will be automatically determined based on the currency

csvImport.confirmImport: Importing may take some time depending on the data size. Are you sure you want to import the CSV now?
csvImport.importCompleted: Imported new book {{book}} successfully, with {{account}} accounts, {{initial}} initial transactions, and {{transaction}} transactions
csvImport.provideAccountsCsvHint: Please provide the accounts CSV file exported from Daily Money+, typically named accounts.csv or accounts-<number>.csv
csvImport.provideDetailsCsvHint: Please provide the details CSV file exported from Daily Money+, typically named details.csv or details-<number>.csv
csvImport.transactionAccountMapInvalid: {{size}} transaction account mapping are invalid. You can still proceed with the import, but transactions with invalid mappings will be ignored.

error.accessDatabase: An error occurred while accessing the database. When you downgrade the app to an older version, it may lead to this problem due to incompatibility between new data and old programs. Please fully close the app, restart, and try again. For more information: '{{message}}'
error.deleteAccountTransactionLinkingExist: There are still {{withdrawalLength}} transfer-outs and {{depositsLength}} transfer-ins linked to the account {{accountName}}.
error.deleteBookAccountLinkingExist: There are still {{accountLength}} accounts linked to the book {{bookName}}.
error.deleteBookTransactionLinkingExist: There are still {{withdrawalLength}} transfer-outs and {{depositsLength}} transfer-ins linked to the book {{bookName}}.
error.initialServices: An unexpected error occurred while initializing services. Please close the app and try restarting it. For more information: '{{message}}'
error.updateWillBecomeOrphanTransaction: Updating will result in orphan transaction.

message.accountCreated: The account '{{name}}' has been successfully created.
message.accountInitTransactionCreated: Initial value data {{value}} for account {{name}} has been created.
message.accountInitTransactionUpdated: Initial value data {{value}} for account {{name}} has been updated.
message.accountUpdated: The account '{{name}}' has been successfully updated.
message.addedToPresentChart: Added {{name}} to the Chart Quick View
message.addedToPresentSheet: Added {{name}} to the Sheet Quick View
message.agreement: Dear user, in order to continue using this application, please review the following agreements. By clicking 'I have read, and aggreed.', you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the terms of these agreements.
message.backedupDatabase: Data has been backed up to /{{location}}, size {{size}} bytes.
message.backupDatabaseToDirectory: Backup Current Database to External Storage Directory
message.bookCreated: The book '{{name}}' has been successfully created.
message.bookUpdated: The book '{{name}}' has been successfully updated.
message.checkDatabaseFileError: File (Date: {{datetime}}) Format Error. Please make sure you provide the correct previously backed up database file.
message.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete the account '{{name}}'? Once deleted, this action cannot be undone, and all transactions associated with this account in other books will be updated (but will not directly affect the data of other books).
message.confirmDeleteAccountCheck: I understand that deleting the account is irreversible.
message.confirmDeleteAccountWarn: There are still {{count}} associated transactions with this account.
message.confirmDeleteBook: Are you sure you want to delete the book '{{name}}'? Once deleted, this action cannot be undone, and all transactions associated with this book will be updated (but will not directly affect the data of other books).
message.confirmDeleteBookCheck: I understand that deleting the book cannot be undone.
message.confirmDeleteInitialTransaction: Are you sure you want to delete the initial transaction '{{account}}'? Deleting the transaction will be irreversible.
message.confirmDeleteTransaction: Are you sure you want to delete the transaction from '{{withdrawals}}' to '{{deposits}}' at '{{transDatetime}}'? Deleting the transaction will be irreversible, and any transfer-outs or transfer-ins related to the accounts within other books will also be cleared (which may affect data in other books).
message.confirmDeleteTransactionCheck: I understand that the deletion of the transaction is irreversible.
message.confirmDeleteTransactionTrash: Are you sure you want to empty the transaction trash? Deleting transactions from the trash will be irreversible.
message.confirmDeleteTransactionTrashCheck: I understand that emptying the trash is irreversible.
message.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove '{{name}}'?
message.confirmRestoreDatabase: A database restore file (Date: {{datetime}}) was found in the application's directory. If you just started the restore process, press OK to proceed with the restore, or press Cancel. In either case, the restore file will be deleted, and you will enter the application.
message.confirmRestoreDatabaseCheck: I understand that the database is being restored, and the current data will be replaced by the restored data.
message.contributeLanguage: If the language you wish to use is not included in the list I provide, and you can offer assistance with language translation, please refer to the instructions on this webpage to help me add the language you need in the future.
message.longPressItemToSort: Long press an item to drag and sort.
message.presentChartExisted: Chart {{name}} already exists and does not need to be added.
message.presentChartHint: You can add charts to the Quick View on the home screen in $t(screen.balanceChart). Additionally, you can go to the $t(screen.preferencesHomeScreen) in the Preferences to sort or remove the chart.
message.presentSheetExisted: Sheet {{name}} already exists and does not need to be added.
message.presentSheetHint: You can swipe left on an account in $t(screen.balanceSheet) to add it to the Quick Sheet on the home screen. Additionally, you can go to the $t(screen.preferencesHomeScreen) in the Preferences to sort or remove the item.
message.provideStoragePermission: You must provide permission to access the external directory for the application to backup the database or export files to the external directory.
message.restoredDatabase: Database has been successfully restored (File Date {{datetime}})
message.selectDatabaseBackupFileToRestore: Select a previously backed up database file, then restart the application to restore the database to the content of that file.
message.showOnHomeScreenAbove: The items above will be displayed on the home screen in order.
message.startCsvImportProcess: Start the CSV import process for Daily Money+.
message.startToRestoreReady: The selected backup file (Date: {{datetime}}) has been placed in the application's directory. Please restart the application to proceed with the restoration process (the application will prompt you again after restarting if you want to continue with the restoration).
message.storageDirectory: The currently permitted external access directory is /{{directory}}, where backup or export files will be stored.
message.swipForMoreFunction: Swipe left or right on each item for more function.
message.transactionAdvancedModeHint: Advanced mode allows multiple transfer-outs and transfer-ins. When using different books, currency values may differ, tt is allowed for the total amount of transfer-outs to be different from the total amount of transfer-ins. Please input with caution.
message.transactionBasicModeHint: When using different books, currency values may differ, it is allowed for the transfer-out amount to be different from the transfer-in amount. Please input with caution.
message.transactionCreated: Transaction from '{{withdrawals}}' to '{{deposits}}' at '{{transDatetime}}' has been successfully created.
message.transactionDeleted: Transaction from '{{withdrawals}}' to '{{deposits}}' at '{{transDatetime}}' has been deleted.
message.transactionInitialModeHint: The initial mode is a special transaction creation mode. It sets the initial value for an account when starting accounting or adding an account, without the need to set a date. Income and liability account types will create withdrawals, while the remaining account types will create transfer-ins.
message.transactionMissing: The transaction at '{{transactionId}}' cannot be found.
message.transactionRestored: The transaction from '{{withdrawals}}' to '{{deposits}}' at '{{transDatetime}}' has been restored.
message.transactionTrashed: The transaction from '{{withdrawals}}' to '{{deposits}}' at '{{transDatetime}}' has been moved to the trash.
message.transactionUpdated: Transaction from '{{withdrawals}}' to '{{deposits}}' at '{{transDatetime}}' has been successfully updated.
message.underConstruction: This feature is currently under construction. Please be patient.
message.withdrawalDepositSumNotEqual: Total transfer-out amount {{withdrawalSum}} is not equal to total transfer-in amount {{depositSum}}.

searchCondition.afterDateHint: Transactions occurred on or after this date
searchCondition.beforeDateHint: Transactions occurred on or before this date
searchCondition.maxValueHint: Transfer amount either in or out less than or equal to this value
searchCondition.minValueHint: Transfer amount either in or out greater than or equal to this value

transaction.depositValueHint: This amount will be added into the transfer-in account
transaction.noteHint: Note for the transaction, length 0 - 512 characters
transaction.transDatetimeHint: Time at which the transaction occurred
transaction.transValueHint: This amount will be transferred from the transfer-out account to the transfer-out account
transaction.withdrawalValueHint: This amount will be deducted from the transfer-out account

validation.enum: Must be one of the values in the list {{argument}}
validation.maximum: Must be less than or equal to {{argument}}
validation.maxLength: Maximum length must be less than or equal to {{argument}}
validation.minimum: Must be greater than or equal to {{argument}}
validation.minLength: Minimum length must be greater than or equal to {{argument}}
validation.notSameAccount: Transfer-out and Transfer-in accounts must be different.
